Question
========
When evaluating the effectiveness of an intervention, which of the following increases the probability of a Type II error?

Answerlist
----------
* Increasing the significance level from 0.01 to 0.05.
* Decreasing the sample size.
* Increasing the effect size of the intervention.
* Decreasing the variability in outcomes of the population.
